https://tmrev.io/movie/43810-Down Argentine Way 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gg3DgplgKq8ZBFnMwMfgGuhSZCs.jpg The story—in which an American heiress on holiday in South America falls in love with an Argentine horse breeder against the wishes of their families—takes a backseat to the spectacular location shooting and parade of extravagant musical numbers, which include the larger-than-life Carmen Miranda singing the hit “South American Way” and a showstopping dance routine by the always amazing Nicholas Brothers. Down Argentine Way
